</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the [[Eden Editor]] is in multiplayer mode. Returns [[true]] in the following cases:
* Multiplayer Preview launched directly from [[3DEN]] - [[true]] in preview and only for the creator
* MP mission is chosen for editing when creating a server: <tt>Multiplayer - Server Browser - Host Server</tt>. When 3D EDITOR button is clicked for selected mission and 3DEN is launched, command returns [[true]] within the editor environment. (see also [[is3DEN]], [[is3DENPreview]])   
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''is3DENMultiplayer''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] [[is3DENMultiplayer]] [[then]] {[[systemChat]] "You are hosting a test server!"};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[is3DEN]] [[is3DENPreview]] [[isMultiplayer]] [[isMultiplayerSolo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
